name: Journey of the Bushi
description:
One of the last students of the Kage Ryu school of Kenjutsu, Gin is a boy who never shows any emotions or passion. His rival, Kin, leaves the dojo to quench his lust for bloodshed and battle, Gin's sensei sends him to retrieve him, however, unknown to Gin, a larger plot is unfolding in the background that could spell doom for the world

On his journey Gin will meet a Miko of the Goddess Amaterasu, learn of the cult of Izanagi who Kin has gotten mixed up with, and try to save the world from doom.
